pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automating the Fitting of Double Linear Mixed Models in 'JAGS' and 'nimble' // Automates fitting of double GLM in 'JAGS'. Includes automatic generation of 'JAGS' scripts, running 'JAGS' or 'nimble' via the 'rjags' and 'nimble' package, and summarizing the resulting output. For further information see Bonner, Kim, Westneat, Mutzel, Wright, and Schofield doi:10.18637/jss.v100.i10.
